name: 猫魈 - Cat with priest
description:
背景Background：

中元节到，鬼门关开。七月半，阴气成，忌子夜外出。

阴月十五，鬼气森森，寒星凉月下，有猫鬼使鬼蜮伎俩，趁着沟通阴阳的这个日子下手。你可以从它的爪下逃生，乃至重新收服它吗？

The Spirit Festival arrives, the ghost gate is open. at Mid-July, Yin energy emerge, do not go out at midnight!

The Spirit Festival arrives, the ghost gate is open. Mid-July, Yin energy emerge, do not go out at midnight. On the day of the Spirit Festival, the streets are filled with ghosts. Under the cold stars and moon, there are cat evils using tricks from the ghost world to take advantage of the day when yin and yang meet on human world.

控制Controls:

按A S键来进行左右移动

按空格键跳跃

按R 键切换世界

按J 键进行攻击

Press  A S to move left and right

Press the space bar to jump

Press R to switch world

Press J  to attack

贡献者Credits:

Oolong Milk Tea - Producer, Game Designer  乌龙奶猹 — 监制，游戏设计

Le Leisure - Game Designer, 2D Artist  乐闲 — 游戏设计，2D艺术家

Mr. Bobby - Game Designer, 2D Artist  鲍比先生 — 2D艺术家，游戏设计

Mousey Ka - 2D artist  鼠鼠嘉 — 2D艺术家

Crotonyl - Lead Programmer  丁烯醇 — 首席程序

Artilor - Lead Sound Designer  Artilor —首席音效师
